title: [Admission] Last date to apply for full refund?
content: I got admission in pes rr nagar thru jee, but i might get bms thru comedk in rd 3. But the comedk counselling process is immensely late so i wanted to ask when the last date for applying for full refund from PES is.

comments.body: 15th august is the last date to submit original docs and to get refund incase u wanna withdraw you're seat
15th july, i think going through comedk is better due to fee difference
what should I consider RVITM CSE or PES CSE I have 13xx rank in PES rankcard and 11.1k rank in comedk so Comedk ke through college lena worth rhega ya PES CSE?
also in the "FULL REFUND" kitna amount deduct krte hai 5.10 lakhs jo liye the usme se kitna refund krenge?
pes is better for academics and slightly better in terms of placement, but if you're getting rvitm at comedk fees take that itself
5 lakh
in the "FULL REFUND" what amount from 5.10 lakhs will they deduct? and should i have a admission letter from any NIT or BITS to get a refund is this true?
they will give u 5 lakhs back and no that is not true , u can withdraw if u want but yeah before 15th
is it true that we should have an admission letter from any NIT or BITS or any other institute to be considered for refund? also where are you getting that refund last date data?
so overall 10k is deducted right?
no that isn't true at all, it is mentioned on website, they will deduct 10k and refund only 5 lakhs
alright! thanks brother I appreciate you for the help.
